name: POTOMAC INTERNATIONAL PARTNERS, INC. ON BEHALF OF VIRGINIA UNION UNIVERSITY
description: Virginia Union University is an Historically Black College/University (HBCU)
sampleDescriptions: Federal funding for this leading HBCU institution to facilitate long-term growth of the Commonwealth of Virginia and the University's students.
